attributes.action: ensure that 100% of all taxes collected on air flight (environmental tax) should be used directly on planting trees and other schemes which result in reducing atmospheric carbon dioxide.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is aimed at ensuring that  present and  new environmental taxes  are used solely  to reduce the amount of carbon dioxide from the atmosphere, whilst at the same time not polluting the environment unnecessarily.   This scheme should not necessarily be limited to the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
